roleset.name: disturb, upset
roleset.note: PERTURB-V NOTES: This verb is only marginally a member of class 31.1, since it rarelyexpresses and emotional state. (from perturb.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: The bursts often occur, they said, after they ``perturbed'' the experiments by raising or lowering the amount of electric current being applied, or switching the current off and on.
example.arg: by raising or lowering the amount of electric current being applied, or switching the current off and on
